A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last jedi is visually stunning\, convention breaking and a bold new direction for the starwars franchise. Jj abrams was called for his linear safe storyline that followed the old starwars formula and now  Rian has tried to go the opposite way he has been criticized harshly. I dont think fans know what they want anymore and if we got it we would still complain. I believe we must wait till starwars episode ix before we can make full judgements on this sequel.
